description: 多尺寸透明大页(mTHP)为匿名内存提供运行时选择功能，通过在匿名页错误期间分配更大的内存块来提高性能

commits.title: mm: add opt-in for multi-size THP for anon_fault
commits.description: 引入了对匿名内存多尺寸THP的支持，允许在页错误时分配多种大小的透明大页

commits.title: mm: thp: Introduce multi-size THP sysfs interface
commits.description: 添加了sysfs接口以控制多尺寸THP的启用和配置

commits.title: mm: allow deferred splitting of arbitrary anon large folios
commits.description: 允许延迟拆分任意大小的匿名大页folios

commits.title: mm: add per-order mTHP alloc_success and alloc_fail counters
commits.description: 添加每种大小的mTHP分配成功和失败计数器

commits.title: mm: implement split folios for multi-size THP
commits.description: 实现多尺寸THP的folio拆分功能

commits.title: arm64/mm: Wire up PTE_CONT for user mappings
commits.description: 为ARM64架构连接PTE_CONT支持，启用连续页表项优化

commits.title: mm: add new KSM process and sysfs knobs
commits.description: 添加新的KSM进程和sysfs配置接口

commits.title: mm: support multi-size THP numa balancing
mm: add large folio shmem swapin support
commits.description: 添加大folio共享内存的换入支持

commits.title: mm: allow THP to be configured by sysfs
commits.description: 允许通过sysfs配置THP的各种参数
